attributes.action: ensure that ballot papers include against the names of MPs standing for re-election the total expenses claimed by them by year since they were last elected.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given such information at the time of voting, electors could make an informed choice.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
